function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Neglecting the impact of temperature on degradation of biomarkers in wastewater can lead to error propagation into estimates of upstream discharge, consumption, exposure, and excretion.","Impact":"Misjudging public health status and over- or under-reacting in the selection and implementation of infectious disease control interventions.","Mitigation":"Account for the role of temperature in the degradation of biomarkers in wastewater and adjust monitoring results accordingly to obtain robust data for informing public health response.","Technologies":"Wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE) studies with temperature adjustment mechanisms.","People":"Decision-makers, public health officials, researchers.","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions, wastewater treatment facilities."},{"Description":"Wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE) studies that do not adjust monitoring results to temperature risk significant under- or over-estimation of the true temporal changes occurring in virus shedding within the community.","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of virus shedding trends and potential misinterpretation of public health data.","Mitigation":"Adjust monitoring results to account for the effects of temperature, particularly in long-term WBE studies across changing seasons and climate regions.","Technologies":"Wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE) studies with temperature adjustment mechanisms.","People":"Researchers, public health officials.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Global wastewater temperature modeling can help in predicting the impact of temperature on the degradation of biomarkers in wastewater, providing a basis for informed decision-making in public health responses.","Impact":"Enhanced understanding of temperature effects on virus shedding in communities and informed selection of public health responses.","Mitigation":"Utilize global wastewater temperature modeling to compute wastewater temperatures and account for the effects of temperature on biomarker degradation in wastewater.","Technologies":"Global wastewater temperature modeling.","People":"Decision-makers, public health officials, researchers.","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions."}]}
